scripts.start:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r ts-node/register/transpile-only -r tsconfig-paths/register --env-file=../.env --env-file=../.env.local dist/index.js
scripts.start:local:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc & resolve-tspaths & cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --env-file=../.env --env-file=../.env.local dist/index.js
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r ts-node/register/transpile-only -r tsconfig-paths/register --env-file=.env --env-file=.env.local dist/index.js
